com.xtructure.xneat.genetics
Interface NEATGeneticsFactory<D>

All Superinterfaces:
EvolutionObject, GeneticsFactory<D>
All Known Subinterfaces:
ARTGeneticsFactory<D>
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractARTGeneticsFactory, AbstractNEATGeneticsFactory, ARTGeneticsFactoryImpl, NEATGeneticsFactoryImpl
public interface NEATGeneticsFactory<D>
extends GeneticsFactory<D>

The NEATGeneticsFactory interface describes methods for creating and copying NEATGenomes, their payload data, and NEATPopulations. NEATPopulations are created with a number of new NEATGenomes specified by EvolutionFieldMap.populationSize().

Author:
Luis Guimbarda
